title: Special screening of Bradley Cooper's 'Burnt' for chefs in Mumbai
text: Updated: October 24, 2015 23:00 IST Special screening of Bradley Cooper's 'Burnt' for chefs in Mumbai IANS English cinema Chefs and food bloggers of Mumbai will soon be treated to a special preview of Bradley Cooper’s forthcoming comedy-drama Burnt . “Every chef will be able to relate to the film,” a spokesperson for the filmmakers said. Cooper plays the role of Adam Jones, a chef passionate about his craft. The film releases in India on October 30. Please Wait while comments are loading... 1.
